meanings.definition: Built with excessive complexity or elaboration.
meanings.sent1: The overconstructed puzzle was too difficult for the young children to solve.
meanings.sent2: The overconstructed model of the building had intricate details on every floor.
meanings.sent3: The overconstructed sandwich had so many layers that it was taller than a skyscraper!
meanings.sent4: Her overconstructed plan for the party included a detailed schedule for every minute.
meanings.sent5: The overconstructed maze in the game was so complex that no one could find the way out.

meanings.definition: Constructed in a way that is overly intricate or detailed.
meanings.sent1: The overconstructed dress had so many frills and ruffles that it looked like a costume.
meanings.sent2: The overconstructed bridge had delicate carvings on every pillar.
meanings.sent3: The overconstructed cake was decorated with tiny edible flowers and intricate patterns.
meanings.sent4: His overconstructed story had so many plot twists that it was hard to follow.
meanings.sent5: The overconstructed painting was filled with tiny brush strokes that created a beautiful scene.
